            AFPOVAI | Brand New 3-Storey Apartment Building for Sale Fort Bonifacio, Taguig near BGC, Mckinley, Makati CBD and Ortigas Center

Code : DS882732
Category : For Sale
Project : Building
City : Fort Bonifacio, Taguig
Unit : 20 units
Size : LA : 400 sqm FA : 900 sqm
Selling Price :Php 120,000,000.00

Details of the Property:
• 3-storey apartment building
• 20 units
• With fire alarm & sprinkler system, provision for tel/intercom, CATV, metered utilities, window type ACU
Single water heater for shower, wood vinyl tile plank for flooring
• LED pin-lights for areas with ceiling

A subdivision, or rather cluster of subdivisions, is found within Fort Bonifacio. Located along Bayani Road, AFPOVAI is a subdivision where most of the military elite of the Philippines reside. While it is still basically in its development, a lot of big houses and mansions, owned by generals and commodores are already built upon it.

If you want to stay somewhere more secure and have access to green scenery in an urban area, then AFPOVAI Subdivision is the right choice for you.

If you’re interested in BUYING this property or wish to SELL a property, don't hesitate to contact us:
Bien Singson

                            <div class="ListingCell-shortDescription ">
            Code: CP-WS

Welcome to San Francisco Del Monte !

Del Monte is a barangay in Quezon City. Its population as determined by the 2020 Census was 10,595. This represented 0.36% of the total population of Quezon City.
Del Monte is situated at approximately 14.6436, 121.0145, in the island of Luzon. Elevation at these coordinates is estimated at 17.9 meters or 58.7 feet above mean sea level.

Building Features:
A very well-maintained 4-storey building with a total of 6 rental units (each unit is around 40+ sqm with 2 bedrooms, 1 bathroom, living area, dining area, kitchen, utility area) on the 1st and 2nd floors plus a spacious private residence (120+ sqm with 3 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, balcony, storage area, living area, dining area, kitchen, outdoor fish pond) on the whole 3rdfloor. The rooftop on the 4th floor has a guest room with ensuite full bathroom and a basketball court (half-court) overlooking the grotto and garden on the 3rd floor. The rooftop has a full 360 degrees view of the city.
The property has 2 separate gates/entrances - one for the private residence and the other for the rental units. The garage can fit 3 vehicles. A guard house has been built for added security. There’s also a provision for an elevator from the ground floor up to the 4th floor.
Conveniently located along Guerrero Street where access to major roads and public transportation is only a short walking distance away - 200 meters to Roosevelt Avenue and 800 meters to EDSA.

Other details:
Flood-free area
Strong water pressure
16 bedrooms
9 bathrooms
3 car garage
2 motorcycle garage
Lot area 201 sqm
Floor area 698 sqm


Near:
Fisher Mall
Roosevelt Avenue
EDSA
Muñoz Market
Waltermart Muñoz
SM City North EDSA
Trinoma
S & R Membership Shopping
Landers Superstore


*** BUY / SELL your property through us !

Visit us at the Lower Ground Level, Robinsons Galleria, EDSA corner Ortigas Avenue, Ortigas Center, Quezon City

            Apartment Building For Sale in Alabang Muntinlupa City

A Brand New 4 story Apartment building For Sale in Alabang Muntinlupa City. Located in a Residential Village in the Alabang Muntinlupa Area. Located directly behind the North-Gate / Cyber-Zone, very near FEU Alabang and Bellevue Hotel in Alabang. Good for Investments.

Perfect for Rental Units of employees of HSBC, Concentrix, Google, Amazon who have offices at the Cyber-Zone, or students in FEU Alabang for a dormitory. Or it can be a 2 star Hotel for AirBnb bookings.

The Apartment Building has a total of 42 rooms with sizes ranging from 10 sqm Studio Units to 34 sqm double bedroom units. All of which comes with a private toilet and bathroom, kitchen unit, aircons, sprinkler, and, a key card door. The building also has an 10 car parking, a attractive reception area, with a sitting area. All rooms come with a sub meters, for long term stay. It also a PWD toilet and ramp at the main lobby, maintenance and storage room, water pump, fire pump, and generator area.

The Title is under a single company, potential buyer ideally will buy the company to save on other charges. Business investment for passive income.

Lot Area: 461 sqm
Floor Area: 1,243 sqm
42 Bedrooms
43 Toilets and Bath
10 parking slots

Asking Price: P70 Million (to buy the company)

            The Newest Lifestyle Landmark of Subic Bay’s Central Business District
The Aurora Suites and Pavilion is the flagship development of Aurora Subic Leisure Inc. featuring a 10-storey hotel suites and serviced apartments building with spectacular views of Subic Bay complemented by a curated commercial and office pavilion for retail, dining, and leisure spaces as well as for business process office and institutional locators.
With Subic Bay Freeport Zone positioned as a key ecotourism and industrial destination in Central Luzon, the masterfully designed The Aurora Suites provides the utmost residential convenience with its studio and loft-type serviced apartment units (with semi-furnished and fully-furnished ready for occupancy options) to meet lifestyle and business needs.

Enjoy special offers and promotions for the grand opening of The Aurora Suites and Pavilion this 2022.
● Number and size of bedrooms – studio apartment open layout - 41.70 sq.m.
● Number of bathrooms - 1 bathroom
● Parking arrangements – parking spaces on a first-come, first-served basis
● Furnishing – Semi-furnished
● Location – near Harbor Point Ayala Mall (650 m), Allied Care Experts (ACE) Medical Center - Baypointe hospital (900 m), SBMA Boardwalk (400 m), Brent International School (6.5 km)
● For turnover in 2022

The Aurora Serviced Apartments
Labitan St. cor. Canal Road and Dewey Avenue, CBD Subic Bay Freeport Zone, Olongapo City

Enjoy special offers and promotions for the grand opening of The Aurora Suites and Pavilion this 2022.

			<p style="margin-left:4px"><span style="color:#ffffff"><strong>The National Capital Region, more commonly known as Metro Manila, is not only the capital of the Philippines but also its center of trade and commerce. With a population of around twelve million, it comes as no surprise that many real estate developments are centered here, especially in the employment areas of the Makati Central Business District, Bonifacio Global City, Eastwood City, and Ortigas Center. </strong></span></p>
			</td>

<h2><strong>The Philippines Is Perfect for Buyers</strong></h2>

<p><img loading="lazy"alt="Apartment for Sale Philippines" src="https://static-ph.lamudi.com/url/bm9uZS9ub25l/10000x10000/jpg/cms/Apartment_Buy_1.jpg" style="border:2px solid #dddddd; float:right; margin-left:10px" title="Apartment for Sale Philippines" /></p>

<p style="text-align:justify">The Philippines has been continuously enjoying record growth across a variety of industries, including the real estate sector. The nation has one of the fastest-growing economies in Asia and has seen a steady rise in investment from domestic and international players. Much of this investment has been focused on the development of infrastructure, which has also had a positive impact on real estate.</p>

<p style="text-align:justify">Whether as an end-user or as an investor, now is the time to buy properties in the Philippines because of the stable economic climate. In spite of politics, which has never been the country’s strongest suit, the past couple of years have seen much emphasis on transparency, and support for local and foreign investments has been unwavering. The real estate business, in particular, has also been consistent since 2011, with top developers successfully launching projects from mass housing to luxury properties.</p>

<p style="text-align:justify">Despite the disparity between demand and supply, there are a lot of opportunities for potential buyers, from new developments to low-interest rates on housing loans. Aspiring homeowners can take their pick from a variety of properties and offer types, from a house for rent to an <strong>apartment for sale</strong>. Internationally inspired in terms of design and standards, property types, especially condominiums and apartments, are reaching a new level of quality and value for money. All these create a lucrative environment for property investments that are expected to only appreciate in the next coming years.</p>

<h2><strong>Apartments for Sale in the Capital Region</strong></h2>

<p>The National Capital Region, more commonly known as Metro Manila, is not only the capital of the Philippines but also its center of trade and commerce. With a population of around twelve million, it comes as no surprise that many real estate developments are centered here, especially in the employment areas of the Makati Central Business District, <a data-mce-href="https://www.lamudi.com.ph/metro-manila/taguig/fort-bonifacio-1/apartment/buy/" href="https://www.lamudi.com.ph/metro-manila/taguig/fort-bonifacio-1/apartment/buy/"><strong>Bonifacio Global City</strong></a>, <a data-mce-href="https://www.lamudi.com.ph/metro-manila/quezon-city/eastwood-city-1/apartment/buy/" href="https://www.lamudi.com.ph/metro-manila/quezon-city/eastwood-city-1/apartment/buy/"><strong>Eastwood City</strong></a>, and <a data-mce-href="https://www.lamudi.com.ph/metro-manila/pasig/ortigas-cbd-1/apartment/buy/" href="https://www.lamudi.com.ph/metro-manila/pasig/ortigas-cbd-1/apartment/buy/"><strong>Ortigas Center</strong></a>. The average price of an <strong>apartment for sale</strong> in the most popular areas based on data from Lamudi price trends are as follows:</p>

<ul>
	<li data-mce-style="font-weight: 400;">
	<p><a data-mce-href="https://www.lamudi.com.ph/metro-manila/makati/apartment/buy/" href="https://www.lamudi.com.ph/metro-manila/makati/apartment/buy/"><strong>Makati</strong></a> - PHP 111,364 per square meter</p>
	</li>
	<li data-mce-style="font-weight: 400;">
	<p><a data-mce-href="https://www.lamudi.com.ph/metro-manila/taguig/apartment/buy/" href="https://www.lamudi.com.ph/metro-manila/taguig/apartment/buy/"><strong>Taguig</strong></a> - PHP 48,134.00 per square meter</p>
	</li>
	<li data-mce-style="font-weight: 400;">
	<p><a data-mce-href="https://www.lamudi.com.ph/metro-manila/quezon-city/apartment/buy/" href="https://www.lamudi.com.ph/metro-manila/quezon-city/apartment/buy/"><strong>Quezon City</strong></a> - PHP 56,700.00 per square meter</p>
	</li>
	<li data-mce-style="font-weight: 400;">
	<p><a data-mce-href="https://www.lamudi.com.ph/metro-manila/mandaluyong/apartment/buy/" href="https://www.lamudi.com.ph/metro-manila/mandaluyong/apartment/buy/"><strong>Mandaluyong</strong></a> - PHP 62,500.00 per square meter</p>
	</li>
	<li data-mce-style="font-weight: 400;">
	<p><a data-mce-href="https://www.lamudi.com.ph/metro-manila/muntinlupa/apartment/buy/" href="https://www.lamudi.com.ph/metro-manila/muntinlupa/apartment/buy/"><strong>Muntinlupa</strong></a> - PHP 43,300.00 per square meter  </p>
	</li>
</ul>

<p>Naturally, the more popular the neighborhood, the higher the price. However, prices are still highly dependent on the total size of the apartment for sale, as well as the facilities and amenities available to the residents. The same variation in price can be seen when it comes to flats for rent.</p>

<h2><strong>Other Important Locations in the Philippines</strong></h2>

<p><img loading="lazy"alt="Live in Style & Comfort" src="https://static-ph.lamudi.com/url/bm9uZS9ub25l/10000x10000/jpg/cms/Apartment_Buy_2.jpg" style="border:2px solid #dddddd; float:left; margin-bottom:10px; margin-right:10px; margin-top:10px" title="Live in Style & Comfort" /></p>

<p style="text-align:justify">With the continuous progress in the country, as well as the growth in population, urban centers are expanding beyond the capital. There are a total of 33 highly urbanized areas in the Philippines, and 17 of them are outside Metro Manila: Baguio City, Cebu City, Davao City, Zamboanga City, General Santos City, Lapu-Lapu City, Cagayan de Oro City, Bacolod City, Mandaue City, Olongapo City, Lucena City, Puerto Princesa, Iloilo City, Tacloban City, Iligan City, Tarlac City, and Angeles City.</p>

<p style="text-align:justify">Modern infrastructure, better roads, improved urban planning, and an increase in commercial and retail facilities are paving the way for investors to refocus their sights outside the capital. Both the government and private developers are also helping areas outside Metro Manila become more livable environments by building and providing more residential options. For example, in <a data-mce-href="https://www.lamudi.com.ph/cavite/apartment/buy/" href="https://www.lamudi.com.ph/cavite/apartment/buy/"><strong>Cavite</strong></a>, the most popular cities are <a data-mce-href="https://www.lamudi.com.ph/cavite/tagaytay/apartment/buy/" href="https://www.lamudi.com.ph/cavite/tagaytay/apartment/buy/"><strong>Tagaytay</strong></a>, <a data-mce-href="https://www.lamudi.com.ph/cavite/imus/apartment/buy/" href="https://www.lamudi.com.ph/cavite/imus/apartment/buy/"><strong>Imus</strong></a>, and <a data-mce-href="https://www.lamudi.com.ph/cavite/bacoor/apartment/buy/" href="https://www.lamudi.com.ph/cavite/bacoor/apartment/buy/"><strong>Bacoor</strong></a> where apartments range from PHP 1,900,000 all the way up to PHP 70,000,000 In Visayan cities, such as <a data-mce-href="https://www.lamudi.com.ph/cebu/apartment/buy/" href="https://www.lamudi.com.ph/cebu/apartment/buy/"><strong>Cebu</strong></a> and <a data-mce-href="https://www.lamudi.com.ph/cebu/mandaue/apartment/buy/" href="https://www.lamudi.com.ph/cebu/mandaue/apartment/buy/"><strong>Mandaue</strong></a>, the price range for apartment starts at approximately PHP 2,700,000 and goes up to PHP 160,000,000.</p>

<p style="text-align:justify">There will always be many options when it comes to an <strong>apartment for sale</strong> in the Philippines. Whether one chooses to buy a unit in the capital or in other progressive and developing cities, the opportunities for finding your new home are endless. You won’t ever experience a shortage of choices when it comes to an <strong>apartment for sale</strong>, especially in the years to come.</p>
